https://tmrev.io/movie/419704-Ad Astra 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xBHvZcjRiWyobQ9kxBhO6B2dtRI.jpg The near future, a time when both hope and hardships drive humanity to look to the stars and beyond. While a mysterious phenomenon menaces to destroy life on planet Earth, astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a mission across the immensity of space and its many perils to uncover the truth about a lost expedition that decades before boldly faced emptiness and silence in search of the unknown. Ad Astra
